original_text:
They shall wander from sea to sea,
    and from north to east;
they shall run to and fro, to seek the word of the Lord,
    but they shall not find it.
korean_text: 사람이 이 바다에서 저 바다까지, 북쪽에서 동쪽까지 비틀거리며 여호와의 말씀을 구하려고 돌아다녀도 얻지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: They shall wander from sea to sea, and from north to east;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바다에서 바다까지, 북에서 동까지 방황하리라

sentences.original_text: they shall run to and fro,
to seek the word of the Lord,
but they shall not find it.
